caption: Figure 1: Effect of cone selection on size of Pareto optimal set
description: This figure shows how the choice of the preference cone affects the Pareto optimal set.  The Pareto optimal sets for two different cones, Cπ/2 and Cπ/3, are shown in pink and blue, respectively.  The grey points represent the reward vectors of 200 randomly selected arms.  The figure illustrates that the geometry of the preference cone significantly impacts the size and composition of the Pareto optimal set.
